title: Terms Part 1 (SKOS)
desc: Defines the terms from CEN-EN 17632-1:2022 as skos:Concepts.

title: Classes and Properties Part 1 (RDFS)
desc: Defines RDFS classes and properties for each SKOS term.

title: Classes and Properties Part 1 (OWL)
desc: Defines OWL class and property types for the definitions in the RDFS file.

title: Shapes Part 1 (SHACL)
desc: Defines SHACL shapes for the classes and properties in the RDFS file.

title: Terms Part 2 (SKOS)
desc: Defines the terms from EN-EN 17632-2:2023 as skos:Concepts.

title: Classes and Properties Part 2 (RDFS)
desc: Defines RDFS classes and properties for each SKOS term.

title: Classes and Properties Part 2 (OWL)
desc: Defines OWL class and property types for the definitions in the RDFS file.

title: Shapes Part 2 (SHACL)
desc: Defines SHACL shapes for the classes and properties in the RDFS file.

title: All as TriG
desc: This convenience file separates the constituent ontologies into graphs.

title: All as Turtle
desc: This convenience file combines the constituent ontologies into a single graph.

title: All as JSON-LD
desc: This convenience file in JSON-LD concatenates the constituent ontologies into a single file.

title: All as RDF/XML
desc: This convenience file in RDF/XML concatenates the constituent ontologies into a single file.

title: example-enum
desc: This example file contains a model of an sml enumeration.

title: sml-example-data
desc: This example file contains data according to sml.

title: sml-example-owl
desc: This example file contains data according to sml-owl.

title: sml-example-rdfs
desc: This example file contains data according to sml-rdfs.

title: sml-example-shacl
desc: This example file contains data according to sml-shacl.

title: sml-example-skos
desc: This example file contains data according to sml-owskosl.

title: sml2-example-owl.ttl
desc: This example file contains data according to sml2-owl.
